Description: Painted sycomore fig wood shabti of Khonsuemheb with a blue lappet wig, a brown face, the body is painted white(discoloured) overlain with a blue collar, brown hands in relief with blue bracelets, the legs inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of the Dead in five rows of black painted hieroglyphs separated by red lines, the back of the arms are decorated with representations of two red baskets, the back of the legs is decorated with a column of red mesh-pattern and black dots, the foot is decorated with a central red and blue stripe.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir John Gardner Wilkinson
